select s.id ,s.name ,count(su.unit_id) as unitCount ,sum(u.enabled) as enabledUnitCount ,count(su.unit_id) - sum(u.enabled) as usedUnitCount from pgsds.sections s left outer join pgsds.section_units su on s.id = su.section_id left outer join pgsds.units u on su.unit_id = u.id where 1 = 1 group by s.id, s.name order by s.id
